Introducing Conor Joseph Chan

September 25, 2018

The Birth

Conor Joseph Chan was born on September 6, 2018 at 9:12 pm, 2.220 kg (4 pounds, 14 oz), 17 in long.

ICU

Conor was transferred to the ICU for an underdeveloped nervous system. He spent 14 days there to grow and develop under medical observation.

Conor Comes Home

After 14 days in the ICU, all of Conor’s vital signs looked good and Conor was ready to come home.

Conor After Birth

Conor’s Lanugo

Conor Comes Home!
